name: Seminar in Health & Disease
description: This course focuses on current medical research related to human disease. Faculty from the Department of Anaesthesia, Faculty of Medicine present their own perioperative research. The potentially profound health effects of anaesthesia, pain management, and the control of the cardiorespiratory system essential for most surgery are also highlighted.
prerequisites: 14 FCE complete, PSL300H1, PSL301H1, HMB302H1/ HMB312H1/ HMB314H1/ HMB322H1
